data.title: Pula weather forecast, climate chart: temperature, humidity (average
data.meta_description: Pula current conditions, weather forecast and climate chart (temperature and humidity). Pula free weather widget (free script for your website or blog). Pula weather conditions, average/minimum/maximum temperature, humidity variation graphs. Pula local time, GMT offset and weather information.

Weather Station: Pula Aerodrome (latitude 45-54N, longitude 013-55E)

Local Time:

Pula is in the "Europe/Ljubljana" timezone.

The "Europe/Ljubljana" timezone uses a Standard Time (ST) / Daylight Saving Time (DST) alternation scheme, and it currently is in DST (since Sunday, 31 March 2024, 03:00 AM local time). During DST, the timezone abbreviation is CEST and the offset to Universal Time (UTC, GMT or Zulu) is +2:00 hours.

Pula will exit DST (returning to standard time) on Sunday, 27 October 2024, at 03:00 AM local time, when clocks will be turned backward 1 hour to Sunday, 27 October 2024, 02:00 AM local standard time. During ST, the timezone abbreviation is CET and the offset to UTC will be +1:00 hours.
